entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • debugreturn.h should not macroize C++ keywords #67470
  • Update runtime Invoke exception handling #67457
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize can't be reliably used with Utf8JsonReaders that have been resumed #67454
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.11601 is missing from symbol servers #67446
  • [API Proposal]: {ReadOnly}Span(ref T) constructor #67445
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DispatchProxy.Create<TProxy>(Type interfaceType) #67444
  • [H/3] stress not running #67442
  • System.Drawing.EnableUnixSupport runtime switch has no effect when dotnet run #67439
  • [arm64] Addressing mode for vectors #67435
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Optional class for less if-else usage #67432
  • [API Proposal]: Of method for List #67431
  • [API Proposal]: Add architecture POWERPC64 to Architecture enum #67428
  • ArrayMarshaller.cs file doesn't get included when a project sets DisableImplicitAssemblyReferences to false but depends on System.Memory #67425
    7.0.0
  • How to fetch users in AD sync when user has moved to different org #67424
  • List<T>.IndexOf outputs incorrect error message #67423
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) while using dotnet #67465
  • [API Proposal]: Socket.SendFile add offset and length paramenters #67417
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.divremTest.RunDivRem_TwoLargeBI #67413
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.RunRightShiftTests #67411
  • Test failure DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress #67410
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_NotepadWithContent_withArgumentList(useShellExecute: True) #67408

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Convert.FromBase64String to support ReadOnlySpan<char> input #67055
  • String.IndexOf differs between Net6 and NetFramework #67451
  • SignedXml fails to validate second signature in same document #27500
    Future
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException raised on System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames() #31045
    Future
  • Under Linux, System.IO.Ports.SerialPort leaks memory when timeout occurs #64768
  • [QUIC] Update to msquic 2.0 #64554
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer for detecting multiple Enumerations #63381
    7.0.0
  • CrossGen2 nupkg on linux-musl-arm64 environment links to wrong libc #66791
    6.0.x
  • MemoryMarshal.Create{ReadOnly}Span should validate length >= 0 #67443
  • Make crossgen trimmable #60016
    7.0.0
  • string.StartsWith() displays unexpected behaviour on Unix? #67313
    7.0.0
  • Async Main, IDisposable, and Exceptions #67407
  • A failed background service should cause the application to exit with a non-zero exit code. #67437
  • [MacCatalyst] App crash in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests #56085
    7.0.0
  • Status is canceled in task without initialization with token and with ThrowIfCancellationRequested call in lambda #67426
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionUtils class for help collection operation #67433
  • Task.Factory.StartNew with a canceled token has the status running #67429
  • System.Text.Json ObjectConverter does not handle reference metadata correctly on deserialization #67171
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json POCOs with constructor deserialization do not support metadata reads #66604
    7.0.0
  • Vector min/max do not handle NaNs consistently #4558
    Future
  • Packages that depended on the latest version of System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe regressed and use a very old version of Unsafe now #67380
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable ArrBoundBinaryOp under GCStress due to failure #67469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable readytorun/coreroot_determinism test on GCStress due to failure #67468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • build: fix corehost.proj dac injection unquoted path #67467
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update System.Runtime.InteropServices.cs #67466
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1695918 #67463
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Ignore non-X509 certificates in SignedCms #67462
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Disable cast profiling by default #67460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Concatenate multiple cookies with semicolon #67455
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Updating the generic math interfaces according to the last API review #67453
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Consistently use AssemblyName in execution script generator #67449
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • Add {ReadOnly}Span ctor (internal for now) that takes a ref and no length #67447
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Manually update C# compiler version to a more recent preview #67440
  • [release/6.0] Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67438
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Don't consider ShadowMethods reflectable #67421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleann-up System.Data.Common.csproj #67420
    area-System.Data
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.ClientSettingsReceived_Success test #67418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Ignore execution scripts under merged wrappers #67452
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #67456
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Update to msquic 2 #67383
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml` #67178
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration` #67174
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventLog` #67200
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Bump Intellisense to Preview2 #67396
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[mono][workload] add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation again" #67450
    area-Build-mono
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix IsPrefix and IsSuffix with ignored characters #67370
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean up JsonTypeInfo constructor #67430
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Refactor JsonSerializer metadata reading infrastructure #67183
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `ValueNumStore::GetVNFunc` #67395
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back direct dependencies on System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe for other tfms than net7.0 #67385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Re-baseline Pri-0 tests with NativeAOT #67412
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't produce unnecessary default interface methods #67409
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` on x86 #67335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Infra fixes for bugs uncovered by testing of the JIT/Methodical merged tests #67393
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete unused Crossgen2PackageRID property #66814
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Detect systemd when inside a container. #67288
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • More XARCH `PUTARG_STK` CQ improvements #67400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • First commit for ppc64le support #67378
    area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [WIP][Mono]Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Call SendResettableCompletionSource.CompleteException in AbortWrite #67341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Removed the hard heap limit heap balancing logic for regions + UOH and fixed infinite retries in case at the LOH boundary #67406
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-manual pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 and x86 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad exception when rollback file has invalid version #24680
    6.0.4xx
  • Create 5.0/3.1 webapplication project with the command on M1 machine and run "dotnet ef migrations add AddMovies" on the command line with meet:"No such file or directory". #24667
  • Referenced DLLs of custom Task not getting loaded after v6.0.200 #24664

Closed

  • react template fails out of the box with 5.0.401 #21949
  • Workload strange behavior #23075
    Discussion
  • dotnet build does not include Norwegian resource files in the output #23493
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1695571 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a netsdk code to the preview message so we can support things like nowarn and documentation #24662
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Support installing workload pack groups #24630
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24665
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SDK integration via BundledNetCoreApp #24550
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • when input is dynamic the compiler thinks the output is dynamic as well #60527
  • Feature 'semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to internal error (VB compiler crash) #60525
  • EditorConfig naming rules are not applied to properties in anonymous types #60521

Closed

  • NullRef in AbstractSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider.State.cs#L161 #60270
    17.2
  • BANG BANG!! Your compiler has died ...(asynchronously) #60520
    17.2
  • IIncrementalGenerator is not incremental? #60504

PullRequests

Created

  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • Remove ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject usage #60526
    Area-IDE
  • Move few `CodeFixProvider`s to Analyzers layer #60524
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60482
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change project-cone-sync to not dump projects outside of the cone. #60465
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable NRT in AbstractSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider #60492
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • WIP Pause taggers2 #60497
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge compiler features into main-vs-deps #60510
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators, Next
  • Introduce a better system for keeping track if a buffer is visible or not in tagging #60500
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60515
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support parsing for Unsigned Right Shift operator #60501
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Adjusting section nesting #60517
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1693428 #60495
    auto-merge
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Modify semanticTokens `isFinalized` logic #60484
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, LSP
  • Refactoring: Switch from passing compilation as a parameter to using new ConversionsBase.Compilation property instead. #60513
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Trimming] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results #41015
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: Updated empty body detection in MVC Model Binding #41014
    Discussions
  • ExcludedRoles parameter in Authorize and AuthorizeView #41012
  • Nesting AuthorizeView and Authorized components with various roles #41011
  • Data Annotation Required is reporting errors on nonannotated items #41010
  • Introduce Results.Typed factory methods for creating results whose types properly reflect the response type & shape #41009
  • Remove JsonPropertyNameAttribute from all properties of ProblemDetails #41005
  • [Blazor WASM] <details> @ontoggle goes into loop on page reload(Ctrl+R) #41004
  • Blazor HTML attribute prefix #40997
  • [Razor] Identifier for CSS Isolation not always appears in HTML tag #40996
  • Blazor WASM CSS Isolation error #40995
  • GetUserAsync takes very long #40989

Closed

  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • HttpLogging Middleware option to log all headers #40981
  • Kestrel should ignore Content-Length: 0 on a WebSocket upgrade #40882
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel should ignore Content-Length for 204 responses #40883
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Why are only GET requests supported for a WebSocket request? #40977
  • Examine password hashing best practices and update as needed #37032
    7.0-preview4
  • How to set SpaDevelopmentServerOptions SpaProxyMaxTimeoutInSeconds? #40892
  • Add ASP.NET Core Visual Basic project template #40954

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • Mark DataProtection.Azure* as non-shipping #41007
    area-dataprotection, 3.1.x
  • Rename shadowCopy flag #41006
    area-runtime
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #41000
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #40999
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #40998
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Introduce the Results<TResult1, TResult2, TResultN> union types #40986
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Suppress "my password" #41013
    7.0-preview3
  • Remove some unused code from installers #40956
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Update V3 password hashing to use SHA512 with 100k iterations #40987
    area-identity, 7.0-preview3
  • Consolidate Blazor Server Template Directives #40984
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Trim IIS and HTTP.sys #40992
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Trim Kestrel #40991
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Trim Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting #40969
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • Support default value for nullable struct parameter #40983
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Annotate additional assemblies for trimming #40974
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40840
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Proposal for how we handle more metadata for auth #39892
    area-security
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding support for custom JsonConverter(s) when deserializing JSON patches to generic object types #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Flyout labels aren't visible #5766
  • Flyout labels aren't vertically centered #5764
  • [Spec/Spike] Enable developers to set custom content description on back button #5762
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Cannot scroll vertically when Orientation is Both #5759
  • RadioBox with ControlTemplate of only ContentPresenter #5758
  • Shell.TitleColor is dark on top level FlyoutItem but white on secondary page #5757
  • AbsoluteLayout problem with two BoxView(s) #5756
  • FlexLayout inside ScrollView doesn't size correctly #5755
  • Border doesn't update with Hot Reload #5753
  • Grid within Border doesn't obey HorizontalOptions #5752
  • CSS Hot Reload for Blazor Hybrid #5751
    6.0.300
  • BlazorWebView CSS is only applied to Windows app but not Android #5750
  • Exception when using Editor with WidthRequest inside horizontal StackLayout #5749
  • TabbedPage with WidthRequest and/or HeightRequest fails to render #5747
  • Hot reload not working after background color change of a control #5743
  • Dropdown From razor Class Library does not work in Blazor MAUI Windows, but works fine in Blazor Wasm Client #5767
  • Add Marker/Annotation clustering for the Maps package that .NET MAUI will have #5735
    Future
  • Updating layout options at runtime does not trigger a layout #5734
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Default template has a double heading/title #5732
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Swapping a control or changing a container breaks hot generated fields #5731
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Editor field OnCompleted on Android soft keyboard #5730

Closed

  • Font Icons in Shell Tabs not showing #4774
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Page with TitleView crashes on Android when navigating back to it from Shell Tab #4506
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Is tabbedPages bugged in Windows for .NET MAUI ? #5754
  • BlazorWebView for WPF Documenation how access the underlying WebView2 to set additionalBrowserArguments or CreationProperties.BrowserExecutableFolder #3861
    .NET 7
  • Shell modal page triggers TapGestureRecognizer which lies on the page under it. #5627
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell Navgitation to Modal Page loads page over app boundaries in Android #4961
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] View underneath Modal Page is currently focusable by keyboard and TalkBack #3127
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Maui blazor app fails to lunch after publish on win 10 desktop + Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll' #5729
  • Blazor Maui error to publish in MAC Host #5727

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixing image shadows on Windows #5763
  • Switch to Modal for window tests #5745
  • Run all navigation through async update #5744
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-entry
  • Add pending changes in Alerts (RTL, Keyboard) #5739
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-dialogalert
  • Fix ResourceDictionary template #5736
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Merged

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220401212931488 to loc #5768
  • Switch shell to using ToolbarHandler #5667
  • Modal Size and fix modal touch events #5644
    area/modal, 6.0.300-rc.2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDbConnectionInterceptor DbConnection replacement #27744
  • Foreign Key conflict for optional relationship #27742
  • Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion #27738
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Change Detection: Exception when adding child to parent entity #27736
  • Collation conflict with SaveChangesAsync using Merge #27733
  • Default value set to entity when retrieve data is null #27743
  • How to query the actual value in Entity Framework core when using a Value Converter? #27741
  • UserManager GetUSerAsync takes very long #27739

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add TPC support to update pipeline #27737
